title: Define System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the AI security system that outlines how it will detect and prevent threats autonomously.

title: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection
description: Design and implement the AI model that will be responsible for identifying potential threats.

title: Implement Real-time Monitoring Capabilities
description: Develop a system that continuously monitors the network for any potential threats. This should include logging, alerting, and response capabilities.

title: Create User Interface for System Management
description: Design and build a user-friendly interface for administrators to manage the system, including features such as system status monitoring, configuration settings, and security alerts.

title: Develop Algorithm for Threat Prevention
description: Create the AI model that will take appropriate actions to prevent detected threats.
dependencies: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing robust security measures to protect against potential exploits.

title: Perform System Testing and Integration
description: Thoroughly test the system to ensure all components are working correctly and integrate them. This includes testing AI threat detection algorithms, real-time monitoring capabilities, user interface, and threat prevention mechanisms.
dependencies: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection
Create User Interface for System Management

title: Document the System Design and Implementation
description: Write clear and concise documentation detailing the system's design, implementation, and usage.
dependencies: Develop AI Algorithm for Threat Detection
Create User Interface for System Management
